tool_description: Sends SMS messages through SMS gateway providers with delivery confirmation and cost tracking.

phone_number.description: Recipient's phone number in international format (+1234567890)

error_messages: Invalid phone number: Phone number must be in valid international format
Message too long: SMS content exceeds maximum character limit
Invalid priority: Priority must be one of [low, normal, high]
Delivery failed: SMS could not be sent due to gateway error
Number blocked: Phone number is on the blocked list
Insufficient credits: Not enough SMS credits available for delivery
usage: Provide phone_number in international format and message_content. Optionally set message priority. The tool sends the SMS and returns delivery status.

delivery_id.description: Unique identifier for this SMS delivery

delivery_status.description: Status of delivery: sent, failed, queued, delivered
